    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:01:24.640
    | text      = But if this is what you're bringing to the table, Trump is a God-ordained king.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:01:35.399

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
